description:
*Over the festive period, we will not be conducting public open for inspections so if you would like to have a look through this property, please send me an email enquiry/phone call and we are organise a time for you.


Positioned in a highly sought after pocket, this magnificent four bedroom family home + two bedroom self-contained residence will impress from the moment you arrive. Infused with natural light, the inviting lounge room will delight with its leafy outlooks, accompanied by a modern Ilve/Asko kitchen with plentiful storage, island bench and meals area.

Quietly tucked away are three bedrooms with built-in robes, two sharing an immaculate family bathroom and one desirably including an ensuite. Residing upstairs is a peaceful parents hideaway with a built-in robe, blissful spa ensuite and generous living space soaked in northern sunshine, flowing to a private balcony deck with sparkling bay vistas towards the city – the perfect perch to enjoy golden sunsets and New Year's Eve fireworks.

A clever use of space, the massive four-car auto garage is currently utilized as a sensational all season rumpus retreat, complete with a built-in bar and cosy wood heater, where you'll love to relax and entertain with effortless ease; along with the added appeal of an additional soundproof music/games area.

Features also include heating and cooling throughout, an upstairs gas log fireplace, two garden sheds, three water tanks, gorgeous low-maintenance garden surrounds and ample off street parking. However, it's the supremely spacious self-contained unit with its two bedrooms (BIRs), open plan living/dining/kitchen, family bathroom, proper laundry and sunny veranda that will steal the show with its fantastic flexibility for multi-generational families, a home business, guest accommodation or lease out (side gate access.)

As for location; this fabulous entertainer is steps to Ferndale Reserve Playground, a short walk to Karingal Hub and Ballam Park, plus moments to schools, freeway access and beautiful pristine beaches. This rare opportunity is a must to inspect!

Opens are as advertised or please contact me directly for a private appointment.
